suggested_project.title: Dreams Beneath the Waves
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring the intersection of dreams and the ocean, potentially incorporating recurring elements such as lighthouses and silence, reflecting on the subconscious and the unknown.
suggested_project.based_on: Recurring themes of ocean (13), dreams (4), and the unique presence of lighthouses and silence.
